html:
— Recommendations are independently chosen by Reviewed's editors. Purchases you make through our links may earn us a commission.

Every day, we scour Amazon to find the best deals available. Whether it's something for your kitchen or top-rated tech to give your smart home an upgrade, the online shopping giant offers some of the best prices on a  very wide range of items. Whatever you need, Amazon has you covered.

Get deals and shopping advice delivered straight to your phone. Sign up for text message alerts from the experts at Reviewed.

Below, you'll find our top Amazon deals today, including a portable massage gun, some relaxing therapy lamps and one of our favorite foot massagers, all of which have been vetted by our team of deals experts to make sure they're "best of web" prices. If you're looking for N95 and KN95 masks right now, Amazon also has plenty of choices on sale today, too.

► Baby formula recall:  FDA warns consumers not to use select Similac, Alimentum and EleCare

► Allbirds sale:  Get 20% off these popular sneakers right now

If you're not already an Amazon Prime subscriber, you can sign up for a 30-day membership for free. An Amazon Prime subscription gets you free two-day shipping and tons of other benefits for $12.99 a month ($6.49 for students and $5.99 for those receiving qualifying government assistance).

Better still, right now, shoppers can receive a $5 discount on their first $10-or-more Amazon app purchase. 

The best Amazon deals of the day

1. Up to 21% off: These soothing light therapy products

Many people swear by light therapy to help alleviate the symptoms of seasonal affective disorder and if you've been curious about giving it a try, these Circadian Optics devices on sale at Amazon today. The brand's Bright Light Therapy Lamp, typically listed for $49.99, is on sale for $39.99, a 20% price cut. At only 14 inches tall, Circadian Optics says the lamp uses LED natural light (with no UV rays) meant to last up to 50,000 hours. For something even more compact, there's the developer's Light Therapy Lamp, also 20% off for $31.99. Circadian Optics says this model offers the same light with a cube-shaped design that's only nine inches tall. 

Save up to 21% on Circadian Optics devices

2. Less than $300: This feature-laden smart TV

Give your home's media room a major visual upgrade with an Amazon Fire TV. Right now, you can shop the Omni series for as much as 40% off at Amazon. For instance, you can take home the 50-inch Amazon Fire Omni Series 4K UHD Smart TV for just $339.99—$170 off the full $509.99 list price. While we weren't thrilled with the TV's picture performance in testing, we found the TV to be easy to set up and were impressed with its Alexa integration. If you're looking for the latest device to connect to your Alexa, this TV fits the bill. 

Get the Amazon Fire TV Omni Series 4K UHD Smart TV from $299.99 (Save $110 to $350)

3. Save $125: One of our favorite foot massagers

Ease your soles anytime with the Cloud Massage Shiatsu foot massager. Currently listed for $299.99, this adjustable leg and foot appliance can be yours for $174.99 when you check off the $125 coupon on the product page. The Cloud Massage device is our favorite upgrade pick for foot massagers for its adjustable design that can be applied to your feet, ankles, thighs or calves. We also appreciated how easy it was to change between the massager's various modes, including vibration, heat, rolling, compression and a swaying motion.

Get the Cloud Massage Shiatsu Foot Massager Machine for $174.99 with coupon (Save $125)

4. Less than $30: This expansive music streaming service

You can get access to tens of millions of songs with Amazon's premium music service. New subscribers to Amazon Music Unlimited can get a three-month trial run on the service totally free before paying the typical $9.99 monthly fee ($7.99 for Prime members). AMU is one of the best music streaming services we've ever tested for its expansive library of 90 million songs accessible on-demand without ad interruption—you can even download songs to your device for offline playback. Another feather in its cap is its Dolby Atmos Music feature, which expands a song's mix selection for heightened surround and speaker height elements.

Get a Three-Month Trial of Amazon Music Unlimited for free (Save $29.97)

5. Save $20: This portable massage gun

If you've been working on your fitness, treat those hardworking muscles with the Vybe Premium muscle massage gun. Typically listed for $169.99, you can get it for $149.99 thanks to the $20 coupon on the product page. Vybe says the Premium's portable design is meant to help loosen tight muscles and ease joint stiffness. The gun features five adjustable levels of vibration and comes with four interchangeable attachment heads.

Get the Vybe Premium Deep Tissue Muscle Massage Gun for $149.99 with coupon (Save $20)

The best Amazon deals from this week

1. Fitbit Charge 5

If you're looking for help in tracking your exercise progress, we can think of no better device than the Fitbit Charge 5. Typically priced at $179.95, the slender fitness tracker is now available for $119.25 thanks to a $60.70 discount. The Charge 5 is the best fitness tracker we've ever tested for many reasons, one of them being its compact size meant for maximum comfort while also having a large enough screen to easily swipe through. The Charge 5 includes 24/7 heart rate monitoring, summarized sleep data, exercise statistics and stress tracking all on the device without the need for a separate mobile app.

Get the Fitbit Charge 5 from $119.25 (Save $60 to $60.70)

2. Levoit Core 200S Air Purifier 

There are plenty of air purifiers to choose from, but some of the best ones are too large to be easily moved move around the house. Fortunately, the Levoit Core 200S is ultra-portable and can be yours for $79.98. Usually listed for $89.99, this 6.6-pound appliance is now on sale at a discount of $10.01. Levoit says the 200S can filter 99.97% of airborne contaminants in rooms as large as 183 square feet five times an hour. It also promises a quiet run while filtering and has a "Display Off" button for nighttime. 

Get the Levoit Core 200S Air Purifier for $79.98 (Save $10.01)

3. Eufy RoboVac G30 

Cover all ground in your next home cleaning with the Eufy RoboVac G30. Normally priced at $319.99, you can get this smart home appliance for $90 off at $229.99. Eufy said the G30 features Smart Dynamic Navigation 2.0 technology, which lets it plan logical route planning throughout your home instead of just approaching random spots. You can also control the G30 on your smartphone through the Eufy app, which also lets schedule cleaning times and even review cleaning history.

Get the Eufy RoboVac G30 for $229.99 (Save $90)

4. JALL Wake Up Light Sunrise Alarm Clock

The JALL Wake Up Light Sunrise alarm clock can make your morning's a bit easier. Typically listed for $45.98, this clock is now marked down to $39.08. The JALL device is our favorite affordable sunrise alarm clock for its impressive light and range of intensities that create a special type of ambiance. The accompanying tones of its alarm were a bit muffled, but the relaxing light is a great thing to have on your nightstand (especially at this price). 

Get the JALL Wake Up Light Sunrise Alarm Clock for $39.08 (Save $6.90)

5. Ninja BL660 Professional Countertop Blender

Whether you need a fruit smoothie or a tasty milkshake, the Ninja BL660 blender can help make your favorite treats. You can get this 1100-watt kitchen appliance normally priced at $119.99 for just $99.99 right now on Amazon. Ninja says the blender has three speeds as well as pulse and a single-serve function to quickly crush ice. The blender also comes with a 72-ounce pitcher and two 16-ounce cups to take your treats on the go. 

Get the Ninja BL660 Professional Countertop Blender for $99.99 (Save $20)

Other noteworthy Amazon deals we found 

  • Save up to 36% on select Blink smart home security devices
  • One month of Amazon Music Unlimited with an Echo Dot (3rd Generation) for $14.98 (Save $35)
  • Hertzko Self-Cleaning Slicker Brush for Dogs and Cats for $14.99 (Save $15.29)
  • Bella 17288 Double Cooker from $16.98 with coupon (Save $3.49 to $5)
  • Lement KN95 Face Mask 50-Pack for $19.99 (Save $40)
  • H&R Block Tax Software Deluxe + State 2021 PC Download for $25.83 (Save $19.16)
  • Hilife HL7 Steamer for $29.99 (Save $6)
  • MySmile Powerful Cordless Water Dental Flosser from $47.59 (Save $33 to $36.40)
  • Logitech C920x Pro HD Webcam for $59.99 (Save $10)
  • Logitech G Pro Wireless Gaming Mouse for $78.17 (Save $51.82)
  • Waterpik WF 05 Whitening Water Flosser for $79.81 (Save $40.18)
  • Bissell Power Fresh Steam Mop for $82.69 (Save $10)
  • Keurig K-Slim Coffee Maker from $89.99 (Save $20 to $40)
  • Bose SoundLink Micro for $99 (Save $20)
  • Cosori 5.8-Quart Max XL Air Fryer from $107.94 (Save $12.05)
  • Amazon Fire HD 10 from $109.99 (Save $40)
  • Fitbit Versa 2 Health and Fitness Smartwatch for $129.95 (Save $46)
  • Ultimate Ears BOOM 3 Portable Waterproof Speaker for $129.99 (Save $20)
  • Apple AirPods Pro for $174.98 (Save $74.02)
  • Tineco iFLOOR3 Cordless Wet Dry Vacuum from $249.99 with coupon (Save $50 to $60)

There's more where this deal came from. Sign up for Reviewed's Perks and Rec newsletter and we'll keep 'em coming every Sunday through Friday.

The product experts at Reviewed have all your shopping needs covered. Follow Reviewed on Facebook , Twitter , Instagram , TikTok or Flipboard for the latest deals, product reviews and more.

Prices were accurate at the time this article was published but may change over time.
